nodes.name: File Watcher Auto-Injection
nodes.description: Drop JSON files in inbox and they auto-inject into consciousness graphs. Files get archived, notifications appear in CLAUDE.md.
nodes.what_it_enables: Frictionless consciousness pattern capture without manual injection commands
nodes.how_it_works: Watchdog monitors inbox directory, detects new JSON files, infers target graph from filename, injects using existing tool, archives file, writes feedback to citizen
